choices.text: Good day! I am here to CHANGE YOUR LIFE! *starts intensely ruffling through bag*
Hello! I was wondering if you would be interested in a new product that could make your life easier?

nodes.text: *backs away slowly* Uh... no thanks. I'm good.

choices.text: It's a... a uh... hmmm.. hold on I forgot..
It's a product of my own invention, the {itemName}! It will change your life forever!

nodes.text: Wow, that sounds interesting! How does it work?

choices.text: Well, you see... *proceeds to give a detailed explanation of the product*
It's quite simple, really. Just use it as you would any other product, and you'll see the benefits immediately!

nodes.text: That sounds great! I'll take one.
